data_table.description: EDIC. Major accident of participants with Type 1 diabetes and involved in the "Diabetes Control and Complications Trial (DCCT) and Epidemiology of Diabetes Interventions and Complications Study (EDIC)" project.

variable.name: FORM
variable.description: EDIC form number

variable.name: CLINIC
variable.description: A1. Identifying information. Deidentified EDIC clinic number

variable.name: EDICYEAR
variable.description: EDIC year

variable.name: EDICYRB
variable.description: Last EDIC year

variable.name: IEB1B
variable.description: B1b. Recognition event: check here if date uncertain

variable.name: IEB3
variable.description: B3. Recognition event. How did clinic learn of the event
variable.value: Annual medical history and physical exam
Clinic recognized event and informed patient

variable.name: IEC1
variable.description: C1. Nature of event. What type of major accident did the patient have?

variable.name: IEC1OTH
variable.description: C1. Nature of event. What type of major accident did the patient have? Other, specify

variable.name: IEC2ACCI
variable.description: C2. Nature of event. Brief description of accident

variable.name: IEC3
variable.description: C3. Nature of event. Which the following did the patient require: patient hospitalization

variable.name: IEC3OTH
variable.description: C3. Nature of event. Which the following did the patient require: other, specify

variable.name: IEC4A
variable.description: C4a. Nature of event. Where was patient treated? Emergency room

variable.name: IEC4B
variable.description: C4b. Nature of event. Where was patient treated? Hospital in-patient ward

variable.name: IEC4C
variable.description: C4c. Nature of event. Where was patient treated? Deidentified EDIC clinic

variable.name: IEC4D
variable.description: C4d. Nature of event. Where was patient treated? Other

variable.name: IEC4DOTH
variable.description: C4d. Nature of event. Where was patient treated? Specify

variable.name: IEC5
variable.description: C5. Nature of event. Was any operation performed or treatment prescribed to treat the patient as a result of this accident?

variable.name: IETEST1
variable.description: C5. Nature of event. Was any operation performed? If yes, specify intervention and result. Test 1

variable.name: IERESUL1
variable.description: C5. Nature of event. Was any operation performed? If yes, specify intervention and result. Result 1

variable.name: IETEST2
variable.description: C5. Nature of event. Was any operation performed? If yes, specify intervention and result. Test 2

variable.name: IERESUL2
variable.description: C5. Nature of event. Was any operation performed? If yes, specify intervention and result. Result 2

variable.name: IETEST3
variable.description: C5. Nature of event. Was any operation performed? If yes, specify intervention and result. Test 3

variable.name: IERESUL3
variable.description: C5. Nature of event. Was any operation performed? If yes, specify intervention and result. Result 3

variable.name: IETEST4
variable.description: C5. Nature of event. Was any operation performed? If yes, specify intervention and result. Test 4

variable.name: IERESUL4
variable.description: C5. Nature of event. Was any operation performed? If yes, specify intervention and result. Result 4

variable.name: IETEST5
variable.description: C5. Nature of event. Was any operation performed? If yes, specify intervention and result. Test 5

variable.name: IERESUL5
variable.description: C5. Nature of event. Was any operation performed? If yes, specify intervention and result. Result 5

variable.name: IEC6B1
variable.description: C6b1. Nature of event. If treatment is still in progress

variable.name: IEC7A
variable.description: C7a. Nature of event. Indicate which of the following occurred as a result of this accident: death (form 140)

variable.name: IEC7B
variable.description: C7b. Nature of event. Indicate which of the following occurred as a result of this accident: injury to another person

variable.name: IEC7C
variable.description: C7c. Nature of event. Indicate which of the following occurred as a result of this accident: property damage

variable.name: IEC7D
variable.description: C7d. Nature of event. Indicate which of the following occurred as a result of this accident: traffic violation

variable.name: IEC7E
variable.description: C7e. Nature of event. Indicate which of the following occurred as a result of this accident: other

variable.name: IEC7EOTH
variable.description: C7e. Nature of event. Indicate which of the following occurred as a result of this accident: specify

variable.name: IEC8
variable.description: C8. Nature of event. Clinic's opinion: what role of hypoglycemia play in the accident?

variable.name: FSASDATE
variable.description: A4. Identifying information. Deidentified date form completed

variable.name: MASK_PAT
variable.description: A2. Identifying information. Deidentified patient ID

variable.name: IEB1ADAT
variable.description: B1a. Recognition event. Deidentified date of occurrence

variable.name: IEB2DAT
variable.description: B2. Recognition event. Deidentified date clinic learned of the event

variable.name: IEC6ADAT
variable.description: C6a. Nature of event. Deidentified date of admission

variable.name: IEC6BDAT
variable.description: C6b. Nature of event. Deidentified date of discharge
